sentences.en: After three month's treatment, the sportsman finally recovered and can reappear.
sentences.cn: 经过三个月的治疗, 这个运动员终于伤愈复出了.

sentences.en: After two months of darkness, a thread would reappear in January.
sentences.cn: 经过两个月的黑暗, 一缕光会在一月重新出现.

sentences.en: Courage seems now to have deserted him. May it quickly reappear.
sentences.cn: 他现在似乎失去了勇气，但愿他能很快重新振作起来。

sentences.en: He had not expected the young man to reappear before evening.
sentences.cn: 他没想到这位年轻男子会在黄昏前再次出现。

sentences.en: I shall reappear in the morning.
If I get my five grand, some items could magically reappear.
sentences.cn: 如果我拿回我的5000块, 有些东东就会奇迹般再现.

sentences.en: If they reappear, they manifest themselves in certain typical ways.
sentences.cn: 一旦它们重复出现就会以特有的方法表现出来.

sentences.en: In reproducible tests, the signal reappear rate was 95 %.
sentences.cn: 重复杂交实验中, 位点重现率95%.

sentences.en: Just a tree is sure its leaves will reappear.
sentences.cn: 就象棵树确信所有的枝叶将会重生.

sentences.en: Many of these ideas reappear in his later books.
sentences.cn: 这些观点有许多都在他后来的书里再次出现。

sentences.en: On gate's pressed key will reappear along with the function change.
sentences.cn: 滑盖上的按键会随着功能的变化浮现.

sentences.en: Should the Black Death reappear, what should we do?
sentences.cn: 万一黑死病再次出现, 我们该怎么办?

sentences.en: Some of Wall Street most notorious practices are unlikely to reappear.
sentences.cn: 华尔街最恶名远扬的一些做法不大可能再现.

sentences.en: The clean water animal association tends to reappear.
sentences.cn: 清洁水区的动物群落将会重现.

sentences.en: The waiter reappear at his side with a loaded tray.
sentences.cn: 侍者端著满满一盘饭菜回到他的桌边.

sentences.en: Would Phileas Fogg, whom they had forgotten, reappear before their eyes!
sentences.cn: 这位已经被他们忘记了的福克先生, 现在又在他们脑子里出现了!

trans.tran_en: to appear again after not being seen for some time
